sentences.sContent: I will preface what I am going to say with a few lines from Shakespeare.
sentences.sCn: 我将引用莎士比亚的几行诗作为我讲话的开场白。

remMethod.val: pre(…前的)+face(面)→写在正文前面的话→序言， 前言

trans.tranOther: an introduction at the beginning of a book or speech
If you preface an action or speech with something else, you do or say this other thing first
